alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 10:20PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lafourche, central Jefferson and west central Plaquemines Parishes through 1045 PM CDT... At 1019 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Port Sulphur, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Sulphur, Galliano, Golden Meadow, Pointe A La Hache and Empire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines
